id: What to Expect From Black Friday 2018 Movie Deals: Blu-ray, 4K Ultra HD and Digital Movies
paragraph: Welcome to IGN's Daily Deals, your source for the best deals on the stuff you actually want to buy. If you buy something through this post, IGN may get a share of the sale. For more, read our Terms of Use.Black Friday 2018 brings you the absolute lowest prices on Blu-ray and 4K Ultra HD movies that we've seen all year. Blu-ray movies start as low as $4 and 4K Ultra HD movies start as low as $8. Digital movies from Amazon and Vudu are steeply discounted as well. These include blockbuster titles like Avengers: Infinity War, Black Panther, John Wick 2, Blade Runner 2049, Wonder Woman, Dunkirk, Deadpool 2, and hundreds more.We've compiled a list of every discounted movie we've seen thus far from Black Friday flyers and their listed price for Black Friday. There are definitely still more to come, so check back on Thanksgiving for more deals and links to anything that's live and available for purchase.None of these prices are valid now. They'll go live on 11/22 or 11/23.Jurassic Park: 25th Anniversary Collection (4K UHD) for $19.99List price $59.99.
